entry.title: New release for SparkyFitness: v0.14.2
entry.content:
POC fix for auto log out when refreshing the browser.

Update your nginx/other proxy to include below settings. Without this, authentication might have issue based on your proxy

proxy_set_header Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme; add_header X-Content-Type-Options "nosniff"; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Ssl on;
